org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.qourum

Class QuorumVoteServerConnect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.qourum.QuorumVote<BooleanVote,Boolean>
      • org.apache.activemq.core.server.cluster.qourum.QuorumVoteServerConnect

  • public class QuorumVoteServerConnect
extends QuorumVote<BooleanVote,Boolean>
    A Qourum Vote for deciding if a replicated backup should become live.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuorumVoteServerConnect(int size, StorageManager storageManager)
      vote the remaining nodes not including ourself., so 1 remaining nodes would be 0/2 = 0 vote needed 2 remaining nodes would be 1/2 = 0 vote needed 3 remaining nodes would be 2/2 = 1 vote needed 4 remaining nodes would be 3/2 = 2 vote needed 5 remaining nodes would be 4/2 = 3 vote needed 6 remaining nodes would be 5/2 = 3 vote needed
